entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is the wife of Arthur Weasley and a member of the Order of the Phoenix. She is described as throwing a nasty look at Sirius.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and is known for being useful due to his knowledge of crooks. He is also described as being loyal to Dumbledore.

entities.name: will
entities.description: Will is mentioned as someone who nicked something from Warty Harris, but no further information is provided about him.

entities.name: warty harris
entities.description: Warty Harris is a person from whom Will nicked something. No further information is provided about him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is one of the Weasley twins and is mentioned as burying his face in a goblet of butterbeer.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is the other Weasley twin and is mentioned as hiccuping while burying his face in a goblet of butterbeer.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather and is described as being loyal to Dumbledore. He also mentions that Mundungus is useful due to his knowledge of crooks.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is mentioned as being loyal to, and is likely the leader of, the Order of the Phoenix.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as looking around at his godfather Sirius.

relationships.description: Molly does not approve of Mundungus, as described by the text: 'Molly doesn’t approve of Mund ungus,' said Sirius in an undertone.
Sirius mentions that Mundungus is loyal to Dumbledore, as described by the text: 'He’s also very loyal to Dumble-'.
Sirius mentions that Mundungus is loyal to Dumbledore, as described by the text: 'He’s also very loyal to Dumble-'.
Mundungus is mentioned as being loyal to Dumbledore, as described by the text: 'He’s also very loyal to Dumble-'.
